data.title: STIMT
meta_keywords: Best Mobile Service Training center in Bangladesh
data.meta_description: This global training provider offers a Smart Phone Repair Course in Dhaka, focusing on industry-relevant skills. Their courses are led by experienced trainers and are available in flexible formats, including classroom and online learning. The Knowledge Academy emphasizes small class sizes for personalized instruction and interactive learning
data.text:
20

Years of Experience

CEO of STIMT. He is also the Founder of Shahin Telecom. Since 2004 he has been doing business in the Mobile repair industry. Shahin Sheikh is a well-known Importer of Mobile spare parts. He is not only an importer but also a wholesaler and retailer of mobile spare parts. He is also known as Mobile repair tools importer and wholesaler.

Shahin Telecom Institute of Mobile Technology is committed to providing the best mobile servicing training in Bangladesh. We aim to provide students with the skills and knowledge necessary to be successful in the mobile service industry.

Our training courses cover various topics, from basic repair and servicing to more advanced troubleshooting techniques. We also offer specializations in specific areas, such as Android and iPhone repair.

We guarantee that you will be impressed with our quality and expertise.

There are several reasons why students and professionals should choose Dhaka as their preferred destination for mobile servicing training. First, the city is home to one of Bangladesh’s largest mobile service providers. Second, Dhaka is an ideal location for learning because it has a large population and plenty of electronic equipment and telecommunications infrastructure.

Third, the city has several top-notch institutions offering quality mobile service training. Finally, the local environment is conducive to learning – students and professionals can expect excellent facilities and support from the local community.
